Headline: #43 43rd Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 43rd/LaSalle
ShortDescription: Eastbound #43 buses are temporarily rerouted via 43rd, LaSalle, Root, State, and 43rd due to a disabled truck near 43rd/LaSalle.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #43 43rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 43rd, LaSalle, Root, State, and 43rd due to a disabled truck near 43rd/LaSalle.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #20 Madison Temporary Reroute at Madison/Laramie

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted via Madison, Cicero, Washington, Laramie, and Madison, due to fire department activity near Madison/Laramie.

Headline: Trains bypassing Jackson
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running, but not stopping at Jackson due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running, but not stopping at Jackson due to police activity.

We apologize for this inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.
